sentences.sContent: He could drink copious amounts of beer without ill effect.
sentences.sCn: 他可以豪饮啤酒而无不适。

sentences.sContent: She listened to me and took copious notes .
sentences.sCn: 她边听我说话边记下大量笔记。

remMethod.val: copi(看作copy) + ous → 能拷贝很多 → 丰富的

trans.tranOther: existing or being produced in large quantities
